headline: Software Developer at Solidus Labs

headline: Software Developer at Torii

headline: Software Developer
summary:
As a Backend Developer at Polar Security, an IBM company, I specialize in designing and building secure, scalable, and high-performance backend solutions for enterprise clients. With over four years of hands-on experience, I have honed my expertise in Node.js, Python, TypeScript, and cloud environments like AWS, Azure, and GCP.
My experience includes working with Scala, Docker, and microservices architectures, enabling me to deliver robust and innovative backend systems.
I am passionate about learning and integrating cutting-edge technologies to solve complex, real-world challenges. Collaborating with a talented, cross-functional team of developers, engineers, and security experts drives my commitment to delivering high-quality products that exceed customer expectations.
I thrive in dynamic environments and continuously seek opportunities to grow, improve, and contribute to impactful projects.
